description.data: A tasty spiked seltzer water inspired by classic margarita flavors, Corona Hard Seltzer Seltzerita Mango is an alcoholic sparkling water that offers the boldness of a margarita balanced by the lightness of a sparkling seltzer. Experience this fruit-flavored seltzer water that invites you to enjoy the moment, offering a day-at-the-beach feeling wherever you happen to be. A bottled seltzer made with natural flavors and a splash of real Mexican lime juice and sweetened with real agave and cane sugar, this gluten-free* Corona beverage features the bold and refreshing flavor of mango. Enjoy a mango seltzer poolside with this unique twist on the margarita from the makers of Corona Extra Beer. description.data: An escape from the conventional, Funky Buddha Premium Hard Seltzer Tropical Exotic Passionfruit Dragonfruit is an enlightened spiked sparkling water. This passionfruit and dragon fruit flavored seltzer will transport your taste buds to an exotic, tropical "funkadise." Featuring natural flavors and made from real stuff like cane sugar and agave syrup for a crisp, clean taste, this gluten-free spiked seltzer water offers full, bold flavor without artificial sweeteners. description.data:
Looking for Answers?
What does it taste like? Seltzer. Does it taste like seltzer or beer? Seltzer. Is there any Bud Light in it? No. But can I drink it when I'd typically drink Bud Light? Yep. Like, can I drink it at a tailgate? Yep. In my garage? Yep. At 40.696252, -76.235543? If you do, take a picture. Is it gluten free? Yep. Also, what's a gluten? Good question. Is it for non-beer people? Yep. Is it only for non-beer people? No. With all these flavors, should I go in any specific order? Nope. You do you. How many should I buy? How many can you carry? Does it turn my beer fridge into a seltzer fridge? A true philosophical quandary. Is it still okay to say dilly dilly? We'll get back to you on that.

description.data: Two Lane Hard Seltzer Cherry Limeade Spiked Sparkling Water is a premium hard seltzer inspired by familiar flavors of home and made with high-quality ingredients. Made in collaboration with country music star Luke Bryan, this spiked seltzer alcohol is made with natural flavors and water from the Blue Ridge Mountains. The result is a gluten-free, alcoholic sparkling water in refreshing flavors inspired by home. At 110 calories* per 12 oz serving, this hard seltzer is named for the wide-open, 2 lane roads that lead to places a highway never could – places where friends and good times are waiting and the drinks are always cold. With its sweet and refreshing taste, this cherry seltzer is perfect for sippin’ lakeside on those endless sunshine-filled days. A premium hard seltzer, Two Lane is your favorite place with your favorite people, no matter where you find yourself. Whether your happy place is on the porch swing or with your feet dangling off the dock watching the sunset disappear, enjoy an ice-cold, 16 oz flavored seltzer water for a taste of home wherever you go.     *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 110, Carbs 4 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams. Notes of fresh watermelon, guava and honeydew are balanced out by a light, lingering hint of mint on the palate. brandHighlight.data: Tres Agaves Tequila is 100% de Agave, USDA Certified Organic made in Amatitán, Tequila Valley, Mexico, the historic birthplace of Tequila. Its Blue Weber Agave is grown and harvested by a single source, then fermented and distilled using traditional methods. Tres Agaves Organic Blanco is unaged while Tres Agaves Organic Reposado is aged 9 months in former Tennessee Whiskey and Kentucky Bourbon barrels and Tres Agaves Organic Anejo is aged 18 months exclusively in Kentucky Bourbon barrels. Tres Agaves Organic Tequilas are perfect for sipping or mixing into classic cocktails. Tres Agaves Cocktail Mixers are USDA Certified Organic, low calorie, low glycemic index, and naturally delicious. They contain simple, easy to pronounce ingredients and contain no high fructose corn syrup (HFCS). Simply add Tres Agaves Tequila or your favorite premium Vodka or Rum. Tres Agaves Cocktail Mixers are highly awarded and one of the fastest growing mixer brands in the US.

description.data: Tres Agaves Organic Agave Nectar is a cocktail-ready sweetener sourced from the same blue agave plants as Tres Agaves Tequila, making it an essential margarita ingredient. This ridiculously delicious, low calorie sweetener is a Beverage Tasting Institute Gold winner. Unlike other honey-like agave syrup sweeteners, this USDA Certified organic sweetener is balanced with just enough purified water so that it dissolves easily in cold beverages, like iced tea, margaritas or other cocktails. Agave nectar is also a great way to sweeten hot items like coffee, tea or even oatmeal. If you're out of margarita mix, simply combine this agave sweetener with tequila and lime juice for a fresh margarita in minutes. Sourced from Mexico's Tequila Valley, blue agave takes six to eight years to mature. After harvest, the agave is slow roasted to convert the starches to caramelizing sugars. Tres Agaves Organic Agave sweetener does not contain alcohol. In Tequila Valley, we trust.

text.data:

Only two natural ingredients: purified water and
agave syrup. Try it as a sweetener in coffee, tea (especially iced),
or oatmeal.

It takes blue agave 6-8 years to mature and once the agave is harvested it is slow roasted to convert the starches to carmelizing sugars with an industry standard four-stage roller mill.

description.data: Four Corners BuchaLada Grapefruit Seasalt Boozy Kombucha Seltzer is an innovative beverage blending the light and refreshing effervescence of seltzer with the bold flavor and elevated spirit of kombucha. With aromas of black tea and mild funk, this spiked seltzer is a boozy blend of craft-brewed kombucha and light, fizzy seltzer water that offers flavors of sweet grapefruit, strawberry, and peach, complemented by the light bitterness and tartness of raspberry with a slightly salt finish. Enjoy this hard seltzer brewed with kombucha chilled, straight out of its sleek can, or pour it over ice to experience the refreshing flavors of grapefruit with accents of peach, raspberry, and rosé. Drink Responsibly. Brewed by:  Four Corners Brewing Co., San Diego, CA

Distilled 5 times at the historic Distillerie de Chanceneaux in the Charente region of France, the process is inspired by over a century of wine-making expertise and craftsmanship. From its inception, CIROC was destined to be a spirit known for luxury and elegance. The vodka of choice for those who seek more from their spirits experience.

description.data: Elevate your next celebration, big or small, with CIROC Vodka Spritz Colada. Made with our finest ingredients in a slim, ready-to-drink can, this cocktail is prepared with vodka distilled from fine French grapes and features creamy coconut and juicy pineapple flavors with a rich finish. CIROC Vodka Spritz Colada is gluten-free, made with natural flavors, and contains no artificial sweeteners. Taste the luxury by serving chilled in the can or over ice. brandHighlight.data: Crown Royal was born as a gift King George VI and Queen Elizabeth of England in 1939 to honor their royal visit to Canada. 600 blends were trialed before settling on the final exceptionally smooth blend of roughly 50 whiskies which was presented in a cut-glass decanter in a regal purple bag with gold stitching. Crown Royal was released in the United States in the 1960s and has since become the top selling Canadian whisky. To this day, every drop of Crown Royal is crafted to meet the same uncompromising standards, making it, to many discerning palates, the finest whisky of all.

description.data: Enjoy a royally delicious cocktail in a ready-to-drink can with Crown Royal Whisky and Cola Canadian Whisky Cocktail. Featuring the signature smoothness of traditional Crown Royal Whisky combined with cola, this cocktail offers an effortlessly delicious way to relax or celebrate. For a refreshing tasting cocktail, simply pour in a glass with ice and garnish with a lime wedge. Crown Royal Whisky and Cola Canadian Whisky Cocktail earned a gold medal at the 2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Includes one 7% alc./vol. 12 fl oz can of Whisky and Cola Canadian Whisky Cocktail. Please drink responsibly.

description.data: Golden Road Brewing Fruit Cart Hard Seltzer Variety Pack includes three different flavors: Cucumber Lime, Mango, Strawberry Pineapple and Watermelon. Agua frescas, Spanish for "fresh water," are delicious refreshing drinks that are a staple of Mexican culture, and found throughout California. Golden Road's spin on this Mexican drink is made from fresh fruit blended with water, creating full bodied and refreshing adult beverages. These alcohol drinks all have a 4% ABV and a range of 95 calories to 110 calories per serving. Enjoy this case of sparkling drinks at outdoor hangouts with friends. Golden Road lives and thrives under The Golden State sun and its many cultural influences.

text.data: sparkling seltzer

description.data:
Looking for answers?
Does it taste like seltzer or beer? Seltzer. Is there any Bud Light in it? No. Is it more seltzer-y or more iced tea-y? Yep. Is it gluten free? Yep. Is it free free? No, sorry. Is it for non-beer people? Yep. Is it only for non-beer people? No. Which flavor should i try first? Surprise yourself. Is it classy because it's tea? Pinky out. Is it as great as your other seltzers? Yep. Is it better? We love them all equally. Does it turn my beer fridge into a seltzer fridge? A true philosophical quandary. When is the perfect time to have one? Anytime is tea time.

description.data: Superbird Paloma is a high quality ready-to-drink cocktail made with 4 natural ingredients - 100% Weber Blue Agave Tequila, grapefruit juice, agave nectar and sparkling water. Crafted and canned locally in Tequila, Mexico, this refreshing 5.9% ABV pink grapefruit Paloma tastes like having one of the best cocktails in the world, made by your favorite bartender. Superbird Paloma is a gluten-free cocktail with fresh grapefruit notes followed by a subtly sweet and tart flavor profile. The bright and bubble mouthfeel carries the 100% pure tequila notes all the way through, reminding you that you're drinking the real deal.

description.data:
For a refreshing, thirst quenching tequila cocktail, the Paloma is definitely at the top of the list and it's a favorite in Mexico. It's a light, fruity drink made with the natural flavors of Ruby red grapefruits. Truly one of the smoothest tequila drinks out there.


With Salvador's®, it's simple - there's no measuring, no mixing, no fuss. Just open and pour to enjoy an authenic, full-flavored cocktail. For any occasion, Salvador's is ready when you are to make your party complete.
